person.bio: My name is Marina Achillea and I am a 36 year old fashion designer from Sweden working and living in London with my husband. I am proud to be reperesenting the ThreeFold foundatoin and look forward to exciting and changing times ahead. Ambassador fell in love with Threefold I believe that the internet should be a fundamental right for every person in the world. That belief is shared by the ThreeFold foundation in itâ€™s quest to expand the reach of the web to every corner of the world.
person.excerpt: 36 year old fashion designer from Sweden working and living in London.
